sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() // this is an static data later // we will call our API and load our data from database const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) // destructure properties from tour object const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( 'Not rated' ) : ( ({reviews?.length}) )}
) } export default TourDetails
